Title: As an crew/pilot, I want to have a summary of the won money for a given week, month or year  so that I can estimate my salary
As an admin, I want to be able to verify that everyone has seen the confirmed flight details so that all assigned staff show up at the right time and place
as a Crew On the flight day I want to have a checklist of things to remember for my flight so that I'm sure not to forget anything
As a pilot, I want to see the position of the other airborne balloons  so that I can keep track of other trajectories
As a pilot, I want to pin and share a possible landing spot during the flight to help the crew reaching the landing region more efficiently
As an admin, I want to access details and reports of past flights  so that I can address customer inquiries and complaints
as a pilot/crew I want to be able to fill out the mandatory flight report so that my flight gets recorded
as crew/pilot I want the flight report to be mostly filled out automatically  so that I save time when filling out the report
as a user I want to see the unreported flights so that I can easily add my missing report
as an user I want to access the flight trace of my past flights so that I can compare the different trajectories
as a crew/pilot I no longer want to see finished flights in the upcoming flights once the report is filled out so that I can concentrate only on the upcomming flights
as an admin I want to see the finishedFlights in the upcomming flights as long as not all reports have been filled out so that no report gets forgetten
as a user I want to filter the upcoming flights by month so that I can more easily look for a particular flight

as a user I want to see the flight trace of an ongoing flight from the take-off to the current location after closing and reopening the app so that I don't loose information about the trace when closing the app during the flight
as a user I want to be able to delete a confirmed flight so that the upcoming flights are up-to-date after a flight gets cancelled
As a pilot, I want to save information about the wind strength and direction as a function of the altitude  so that later during the flight I can include it into the altitude choice
As an crew/pilot, I want to include a photo of caused or discovered damages on equipment after the flight so that admin can get informed more easily
As an pilot, I want to see forbidden zones on the map during the flight so that I can further decrease the risk of entering by accident
as a pilot I want to share/suggest an entry point into my landing field with my crew so that they can quickly and convienently enter the field
as discussed in #68  As crew/pilot I want to be able to set regular availabilities in a descriptif way so that I'm faster than setting my availabilities for each individual time slot
As crew/pilot, I want to get a notification when I'm assigned to a flight so that I stay up-to-date of my scheduled flights and that I can react in case of a schedule conflict
Fix Bug: When spamming the back button, the navigation should return to the default screen (Home) instead of ending up on a blank page.
integrate FinishedFlight DB connection into ViewModel
Sort upcoming flights by date and add month
As an admin, I want to assign only crew/pilots that are available for the particular flight so that every flight has assignees that are actually available
as a crew/pilot, I want that the meet-up location with the passengers in the confirmed flight details screen is linked to google maps so that I can easily find the correct location
as an admin I want to be able to confirm the flight only if all roles have been assigned so that I'm sure not to forget to assign a role
as an admin I want to confirm a flight by adding final information and remarks so that all required details for the flight are clear
as a user  I want to have a link from the meet-up locations to google maps so that I can navigate more easily to the location
as a user  I want to access the app with my appropriate role (crew/pilot/admin) so that I have access to the correct functionalities and screens
End-to-end test: as staff I want to get more detailed information about a flight displayed in the overview when I click on it so that I can get more details for a specific flight
connect new filtered DB functions to FlightsViewModel
as staff I want to see past flights so that I have an overview of the flight history
As a crew, I want to see the current position of the balloon throughout the flight so that I can stay close by
As a pilot, I want to notify my crew that my balloon has landed and share my exact position with one click so that they can find me fast while I can concentrate on post-landing procedures
As crew & pilot, we want to have a chat just for the current flight team so that we can easily exchange flight intern information without disturbing other teams or non assigned staff
As an admin, I want to send a summary of the flight confirmation to the relevant staff so that assigned staff gets all the relevant information about the upcoming flight
Create chat group on confirm flight
Ongoing flight setup listener on start/stop flight
Flight screen UI button start flight
